task.title: How to Get into the AirBNB
task.shortdesc: This will help you to navigate the interactions with the owner.

context.p: You cannot enter the house until 10 a.m. in Saturday morning.

step.cmd: Text the owner an hour before you plan to arrive.
Meet the owner at the house and get the key.
Receive a tour from the owner and ask any questions that you have. *be respectful*
Unpack, and get ready to have fun.
